article_title: Eyewitnesses say a car carrying Haniyeh's sons was hit by strike.
sentence: As  we've  been  reporting,  the  political  leader  of  Hamas,  Ismail  Haniyeh,  says  three  of  his  sons  and  several  of  his  grandchildren  have  been  killed  in  an  Israeli  strike  in  Gaza.

article_title: Eyewitnesses say a car carrying Haniyeh's sons was hit by strike.
sentence: He  also  accused  Israel  of  killing  them  in  order  to  try  to  shift  Hamas'  position  in  the  current  ceasefire  talks.
